```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(dplyr)

library(stringr)
```

<br>

### Get smoking data.

```{r 2}
smoking_data <- 'https://chronicdata.cdc.gov/resource/gx47-p4ij.json' %>% 
  fromJSON() %>% 
  as.data.frame()
```

### Get state taxation data.

```{r 3}
table <- "https://www.cdc.gov/statesystem/excisetax.html" %>% 
  read_html() %>% 
  html_nodes(xpath = "//tbody") %>% 
  html_text()
```
